name: Vibe Coding Prompts Library
description: If you're tired of generic AI prompts that barely apply to your use case, this is for you.Vibe Coding Prompts is a Notion-based library designed to help you build full-stack apps through clear, contextual prompts — no fluff, no filler. Whether you're defining your data model, designing UI components, writing CRUD logic, or rolling back a broken deploy, each prompt is tailored to match real-world product workflows.And it’s not just a prompt dump. Every entry includes a code-ready prompt plus a us
